text: Aéroport International de Chlef , also known as Aboubakr Belkaid Airport, is an airport north of the city of Chlef, in Algeria. The DAOI-Chlef VOR/DME (Ident: CLF) is located on the field. During World War II, the facility was known as "Warnier Airfield". It was a major Twelfth Air Force base of operations during the North African Campaign against the German Afrika Korps. ==Airlines and destinations== ==See also== * List of airports in Algeria * Transport in Algeria == References == ==External links== * Google Maps - Chlef * * Category:Airports in Algeria Category:Buildings and structures in Chlef Province
title: Chlef International Airport
